text: Neutral Yer (Majuscule: Ꙏ, Minuscule: ꙏ) is used to transcribe Ь or Ъ when it is not possible to tell the difference in a manuscript.[1] == Appearance == It has the appearance of Yer, with a hook at the top of the stem. In some fonts it appears identical to Ъ. Category:Cyrillic letters
title: Neutral Yer
